main_symptom: Severe pleural effusion;染色显微镜 examination revealed a large number of cocci and bacilli.
zhu_su:
上个星期也出现呼吸急促，比较喜欢去阳台嗮太阳。今天突然开始不吃东西，精神变差，呼吸急促，呼吸困难。
触摸气管敏感。

main_symptom: Otitis externa, initiate清洗with medication for one week and adjust the清洗frequency based on the recovery progress.
zhu_su: 发现狗狗甩耳朵，有点流脓。

main_symptom: Pune:疑似胃炎
zhu_su: 周天换的猫粮，后开始有呕吐，状态蔫，今天呕吐胃液，没有食欲

main_symptom: Feline Panleukopenia weak positive; owner放弃treatment
zhu_su: 没食欲  呕吐  多次呕吐  发烧  身上有跳蚤屎

main_symptom: CDV, CPV positive, He, owner放弃 treatment
zhu_su: 呕吐一次，拉稀一次，不吃饭，体温偏高，皮肤病，家里之前死的那两只也是拉稀呕吐死的，一直在一起生活，

main_symptom: Diabetes, the owner declines further examination and放弃 treatment.
zhu_su:
主诉近段时间在家出现喝水多，排尿多，体重日益减轻，走路有时打晃，精神尚可
生化检查肝酶指标升高，血糖30+
主人不做进一步检查，放弃治疗，

main_symptom: Paracentesis, owner不同意检查
zhu_su: 抽腹水，无力，喘气。

main_symptom: Exfoliation of the nail plate
zhu_su: 右前肢第四指指甲从根部裂开，红肿，相邻指尖发红

main_symptom: Pyoderma;少量真菌
zhu_su: 皮肤病有半年左右，用过真菌喷剂，真菌针有好过，瘙痒

FPV++++FCOV++++

main_symptom: Preliminary Clinical Diagnosis: Fracture of the left leg with suppurative swelling at the affected site; 7.5 cm medial toe断裂 defect with hemorrhage, and external fixation of the tarsal joint fracture.
zhu_su:
前天在其他医院拍片发现腿断了，医生用胶带绑了，昨天发现腿发黑，就拆掉了，腿肿胀的厉害，今天暂时还没有吃喝，精神状态一般
7.2  腿部肿的比昨天好点，但是还有一点化脓感染，回去有看到吃饭，脚也能放下来了
7.3  回去精神状态吃喝都挺好，腿还有点感染，
7.4  精神状态吃喝都挺好，大腿部消肿点，骨折处还有点感染
7.5 腿部患处有出血，其他目前还好。PE:有一脚趾缺损，流血，可能是自我损伤，或卡到造成。
7.6  回去把头圈和外固定支架全部啃掉，没有流血，吃喝都正常
7.7  回去吃的不多，精神状态没前
final_disease: Rupture of the Extensor Digitorum Longus Tendon

zhu_su: 前几日外出回来后 疑似打架受伤 指甲脱落漏出血线

main_symptom: The nail is embedded in the flesh.
zhu_su: 双侧后肢悬指，扎进肉里

main_symptom: Dermatosis; Pyoderma; Hypothyroidism
zhu_su: 皮肤病很严重，化脓了。这两天不怎末吃，精神尚可，外援看过打针总是反复不好。有抓挠，一夜就这样了，肚子硬硬的.TT4=6，肝胆指标高，CRP=14.53.五分类白细胞升高，提示炎症。

main_symptom: Ophthalmology: Conjunctivitis; Immunology: First dose of妙三多 (Miaosanduo)
zhu_su: 家养两月，右眼眼泪多。偶尔会有打喷嚏情况

main_symptom: Suspected Hypothyroidism
zhu_su: 前三天开始打喷嚏，开始有一些鼻痂

final_disease: Diseases of the Nose, Nasopharynx, and Paranasal Sinuses

main_symptom: Right forelimb nail embedded in the paw pad; dental calculus; gingival redness and swelling

main_symptom: Owner M brought this cat to the clinic after finding it; the cat exhibited instability while standing and difficulty breathing. DR imaging did not reveal any obvious fractures, but showed increased density in the pulmonary bronchi and an anteriorly displaced heart. Subsequent recovery was relatively good, and an echocardiogram was recommended. Biochemical tests indicated ALT at 144 and AST at 78, with elevated liver indices, and creatine kinase at 2711. Blood tests showed decreased hemoglobin and hematocrit levels. Temporary intravenous fluids were administered to control inflammation,补充体能营养, and liver protection treatment was provided. Treatment lasted approximately one week, with blood tests and biochemical re-evaluations on the 4th day. There is a 30-40% mortality rate, which has been clearly communicated to the owner.
zhu_su: M主人捡到该猫到院就诊，站立不稳，呼吸困难，DR未见明显骨折，肺部支气管密度增高，心脏位置前移，后续恢复较好建议心超检查。生化ALT144,AST78,肝脏指标升高，肌酸激酶2711，血检血红蛋白和红细胞压积降低，暂输液控制炎症，补充体能营养，保肝治疗。治疗一周左右，第4天复查血检和生化。存在30-40%死亡率，已明确告知主人

main_symptom: Jumping from a height resulted in abdominal hemorrhage, laceration of the mucocutaneous junction of the jaw, and nail断裂.
zhu_su: 从六楼跳下来了 不能动了 喘  大小便失禁 吐血
final_disease: Rupture of the Extensor Digitorum Longus Tendon

main_symptom: Otitis pending examination; second dose of妙三多 (Miaosan duo) immunization.
zhu_su: 食欲大小便正常，未见打喷嚏等异常，耳朵发炎很脏

main_symptom: Diabetes; Cataract; Ultrasound shows increased echogenicity of the liver and kidneys, with an indeterminate hypoechoic mass near the stomach, liver, and spleen, requiring follow-up examination later. T4 levels are low, necessitating a recheck to determine the presence of hypothyroidism. Urine sample indicates bacterial infection.
zhu_su:
基本情况：平常吃自制，面条米饭混着蔬菜鸡肉，牛肉，还有水果。近一个月吃的多，喝水是之前的四倍，消瘦。眼睛表皮伤口一直没有愈合，伤口有涂碘伏。
症状+持续时间：多饮多尿多食近一个月
生活方式：家养
饮食：自制
免疫驱虫史：免疫完成，驱虫未做。
用药史：无
既往病史：无
过敏史：无
